steps.title: Programmatically Edit Watermarks in {{FileformatCap}} Documents with the {{EnvName}} API

content.title: **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** furnishes {{EnvName}} developers with a robust API for programmatically manipulating watermarks within diverse {{FileformatCap}} documents. This guide outlines the process:
content.step_1: Initiate the workflow by supplying your {{FileformatCap}} file as an argument to the **Watermarker** class constructor. The file can be provided as either a byte stream, a file stream, or a reference to a local disk location.
content.step_2: Subsequently, leverage the **SearchCriteria** object to pinpoint the specific watermarks requiring modification. This object enables the identification of watermarks previously embedded within the document.
content.step_3: Upon successful execution of the search, you'll receive a collection of relevant watermarks. These watermarks offer granular control, allowing you to modify properties such as dimensions, page positioning, text content, color scheme, image data, and more.
content.step_4: Following the completion of watermark edits, persist the modified document. The API facilitates storage using either a local file path or a stream object.

more_features.title: Supercharge Your Workflows with Watermark Management
more_features.description: Simplify watermarking across diverse file formats in your {{EnvName}} applications with our robust library. Effortlessly add, edit, search for, or remove watermarks to enhance document security and branding.

feature_1.title: Streamline Watermarking in Your Applications
feature_1.content: Leverage the power of {{ProdFullName}} to seamlessly integrate watermarking functionality into your {{EnvName}} applications. Our intuitive API simplifies watermark creation, management, search, and editing, eliminating the need for complex manual processes.

feature_2.title: Granular Watermark Customization
feature_2.content: Unleash the full potential of watermark customization with our comprehensive API. Fine-tune every detail, including size, orientation, color scheme, and font selection, to create watermarks that perfectly align with your branding and security requirements.

feature_3.title: Harness Document-Specific Features for Flexible Watermarking
feature_3.content: Unlock the power of native functionalities within various document formats. Utilize elements like document background, annotations, headers, or other objects as unique watermark containers, catering to diverse document types and security needs.
